org.apache.freemarker.spring.model

Class AbstractSpringTemplateCallableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.freemarker.spring.model.AbstractSpringTemplateCallableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TemplateCallableModel, TemplateModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSpringTemplateDirectiveModel, AbstractSpringTemplateFunctionModel

    public abstract class AbstractSpringTemplateCallableModel
extends Object
implements TemplateCallableModel
    Abstract TemplateCallableModel for derived classes to support Spring MVC based templating environment.

      • getBindStatusTemplateModel

        protected final TemplateModel getBindStatusTemplateModel(Environment env,
                                                         ObjectWrapperAndUnwrapper objectWrapperAndUnwrapper,
                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.support.RequestContext requestContext,
                                                         String path,
                                                         boolean ignoreNestedPath)
                                                  throws TemplateException
        Find BindStatus with no htmlEscape option from RequestContext by the path and wrap it as a TemplateModel.

        NOTE: In FreeMarker, there is no need to depend on BindStatus#htmlEscape option as FreeMarker template expressions can easily set escape option by themselves. Therefore, this method always get a BindStatus with htmlEscape option set to false.

        Parameters:
        env - Environment
        objectWrapperAndUnwrapper - ObjectWrapperAndUnwrapper
        requestContext - Spring RequestContext
        path - bind path
        ignoreNestedPath - flag whether or not to ignore the nested path
        Returns:
        TemplateModel wrapping a BindStatus with no htmlEscape option from RequestContext by the path
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if template exception occurs

      • getSpringTemplateCallableHashModel

        protected SpringTemplateCallableHashModel getSpringTemplateCallableHashModel(Environment env)
                                                                      throws TemplateException
        Return the internal TemplateHashModel wrapper for templating in Spring Framework applications.
        Parameters:
        env - environment
        Returns:
        the internal TemplateHashModel wrapper for templating in Spring Framework applications
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if template exception occurs
